00034 typedef bool (*ContactDestroyedCallback)(void* userPersistentData);
00035 typedef bool (*ContactProcessedCallback)(btManifoldPoint& cp,void* body0,void* body1);

00044 //the enum starts at 1024 to avoid type conflicts with btTypedConstraint

00051 #define MANIFOLD_CACHE_SIZE 4

00162         void removeContactPoint (int index)
00163         {
00164                 clearUserCache(m_pointCache[index]);
00165 
00166                 int lastUsedIndex = getNumContacts() - 1;
00167 //              m_pointCache[index] = m_pointCache[lastUsedIndex];
00168                 if(index != lastUsedIndex) 
00169                 {
00170                         m_pointCache[index] = m_pointCache[lastUsedIndex]; 
00171                         //get rid of duplicated userPersistentData pointer
00172                         m_pointCache[lastUsedIndex].m_userPersistentData = 0;
00173                         m_pointCache[lastUsedIndex].m_appliedImpulse = 0.f;
00174                         m_pointCache[lastUsedIndex].m_contactPointFlags = 0;
00175                         m_pointCache[lastUsedIndex].m_appliedImpulseLateral1 = 0.f;
00176                         m_pointCache[lastUsedIndex].m_appliedImpulseLateral2 = 0.f;
00177                         m_pointCache[lastUsedIndex].m_lifeTime = 0;
00178                 }
00179 
00180                 btAssert(m_pointCache[lastUsedIndex].m_userPersistentData==0);
00181                 m_cachedPoints--;
00182 
00183                 if (gContactEndedCallback && m_cachedPoints == 0)
00184                 {
00185                         gContactEndedCallback(this);
00186                 }
00187         }
00188         void replaceContactPoint(const btManifoldPoint& newPoint, int insertIndex)
00189         {
00190                 btAssert(validContactDistance(newPoint));
00191 
00192 #define MAINTAIN_PERSISTENCY 1
00193 #ifdef MAINTAIN_PERSISTENCY
00194                 int lifeTime = m_pointCache[insertIndex].getLifeTime();
00195                 btScalar appliedImpulse = m_pointCache[insertIndex].m_appliedImpulse;
00196                 btScalar appliedLateralImpulse1 = m_pointCache[insertIndex].m_appliedImpulseLateral1;
00197                 btScalar appliedLateralImpulse2 = m_pointCache[insertIndex].m_appliedImpulseLateral2;
00198 
00199                 bool replacePoint = true;
00202                 if (newPoint.m_contactPointFlags & BT_CONTACT_FLAG_FRICTION_ANCHOR)
00203                 {
00204                         //   printf("appliedImpulse=%f\n", appliedImpulse);
00205                         //   printf("appliedLateralImpulse1=%f\n", appliedLateralImpulse1);
00206                         //   printf("appliedLateralImpulse2=%f\n", appliedLateralImpulse2);
00207                         //   printf("mu = %f\n", m_pointCache[insertIndex].m_combinedFriction);
00208                         btScalar mu = m_pointCache[insertIndex].m_combinedFriction;
00209                         btScalar eps = 0;  //we could allow to enlarge or shrink the tolerance to check against the friction cone a bit, say 1e-7
00210                         btScalar a = appliedLateralImpulse1 * appliedLateralImpulse1 + appliedLateralImpulse2 * appliedLateralImpulse2;
00211                         btScalar b = eps + mu * appliedImpulse;
00212                         b = b * b;
00213                         replacePoint = (a) > (b);
00214                 }
00215 
00216                 if (replacePoint)
00217                 {
00218                         btAssert(lifeTime >= 0);
00219                         void* cache = m_pointCache[insertIndex].m_userPersistentData;
00220 
00221                         m_pointCache[insertIndex] = newPoint;
00222                         m_pointCache[insertIndex].m_userPersistentData = cache;
00223                         m_pointCache[insertIndex].m_appliedImpulse = appliedImpulse;
00224                         m_pointCache[insertIndex].m_appliedImpulseLateral1 = appliedLateralImpulse1;
00225                         m_pointCache[insertIndex].m_appliedImpulseLateral2 = appliedLateralImpulse2;
00226                 }
00227 
00228                 m_pointCache[insertIndex].m_lifeTime = lifeTime;
00229 #else
00230                 clearUserCache(m_pointCache[insertIndex]);
00231                 m_pointCache[insertIndex] = newPoint;
00232 
00233 #endif
00234         }
00235 
00236         bool validContactDistance(const btManifoldPoint& pt) const
00237         {
00238                 return pt.m_distance1 <= getContactBreakingThreshold();
00239         }
00241         void    refreshContactPoints(  const btTransform& trA,const btTransform& trB);
00242 
00243         
00244         SIMD_FORCE_INLINE       void    clearManifold()
00245         {
00246                 int i;
00247                 for (i=0;i<m_cachedPoints;i++)
00248                 {
00249                         clearUserCache(m_pointCache[i]);
00250                 }
00251 
00252                 if (gContactEndedCallback && m_cachedPoints)
00253                 {
00254                         gContactEndedCallback(this);
00255                 }
00256                 m_cachedPoints = 0;
00257         }
